website_summaries.verdict: Motorola's new Moto G exemplifies the budget Android phone, but if you prefer your data LTE-flavored, it's best to wait for that model.
pros: The 5-inch Motorola Moto G once again turns in its signature hand-friendly design and hardware specs that impress for the price
cons: In LTE markets, the Moto G's absence of the fast data standard is a drag

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a good dual sim phone and have tried the samsung core duos and the blu. Was not happy with either. Mainly dropping out of signal. With the moto g the 2nd sim doesn't seem to receive as good as signal as the first, but the dropping out of signals so far has been acceptable. Both sims use the same carrier. I like the speed of the processor. I do believe I've found a good dual sim phone and can stop searching for any more. The price was also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy.
customer_reviews.text: So Far... so Good. Phone works.. All features are responding. I love the Dual Sims feature. My personal phone and my business line. The phone clearly marks which phone number was called. I had a Samsung galaxy 2 for three years. Loved the phone but I don't like the new price for a New phone. This phone is an outstanding buy : Features an cost... A winner. I actually ordered another Moto G single Sim for another phone line. !!
customer_reviews.author: pat kennedy weber

customer_reviews.title: bitter sweet
customer_reviews.text: The phone is really good and as described a beautiful machine for a reasonable price. However for me the sound is to soft.The speakerphone inconvenient. Like his competitors it does everything but forgets it is primerely a phone. I find Android complicated to use with to much advertisements, pops and upgrades...

customer_reviews.title: It's a good size, has nice fit/finish and a good feel ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid phone. Been using it now for about a month now. It's a good size, has nice fit/finish and a good feel in your hand. The hardware that it comes with is an absolute bargain, but it can get just a touch bogged down sometimes. 4 stars because it doesn't support 4G LTE. Otherwise, I'm really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: well-made, excellent for int'l travelers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for use with my GSM providers both the US and Europe - I no longer have to juggle different sim cards. I am very pleased with the solid, well-made feel to it and its ease of use. Highly recommended. FYI: mine came with a set of simple set-up instructions, a warranty and a wall (i.e., not usb) charger.
customer_reviews.author: Ryuten

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone. Just what I had expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. Just what I had expected. Came with Android 5.0 version. Both the dual sim slots work in India. Very happy with the purchase. Just that the battery lasts for only 1 day and have to recharge irrespective of the usage.
customer_reviews.author: DJAY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone, compares well (in functionality
customer_reviews.text: A gift to a brother in law. Awesome phone, compares well (in functionality, screen, camera, etc) to mi iPhone6. My wife's Nexus 4 seems like a dinosaur compared to this G
customer_reviews.author: C.F.C.

customer_reviews.title: Small but heavy and thick..
customer_reviews.text: Small but heavy and thick.. you can get better one for cheaper.. like BLU
customer_reviews.author: WM

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my mum and she love sit, it's easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mum and she love sit, it's easy to use, affordable and it's a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Joyofurlife

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a second phone to use when I am on vacation in the Caribbean. After receiving the phone and reviewing all the features, it definitely exceeded my expectations. It is super fast, great audio and video. I have a samsung galaxy s4 and this phone is good as the Samsung and it is way less in cost .
customer_reviews.author: Robert Celestine

customer_reviews.title: excellent product, had responded earlier and who had not ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, had responded earlier and who had not reached the destination that is Venezuela. But 100% recommend this arrivo with charger, headphones and usb cable. as the team is already configured and loaded all applications and really looks good standing.
customer_reviews.author: ERICK OCHOA

customer_reviews.title: beautiful display and very responsive
customer_reviews.text: Received phone in new condition and on time. It is fast, beautiful display and very responsive. It came loaded with Android 4.4.4. I'm loving it so far. Time will tell but it seems like a quality product that will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: jdude

customer_reviews.title: Powerhouse on a budget!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone and especially for the price! No frills, very little bloat wear. Smooth, fast, well worth the small price tag. Dual SIM works flawlessly and I use the Dual SIM functionality very frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: It works in Argentina
customer_reviews.text: The package was delivered as expected. Everything was right. I'm in Argentina and this devices works perfectly with 3G and GSM network.100% recomendable.
customer_reviews.author: Federico López

customer_reviews.title: IT DIDN'T CAME WITH ACCESSORIES
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone but it came without the shells, without wall charger and without headphones. What can I do?
customer_reviews.author: Juan Ignacio Elena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought for a gift and the person love it
customer_reviews.author: OSAZUWA E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cellphone. Really fast, 24 hours of life battery and a great camera. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Manuela Barros

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the operation and with the Moto G. Amazon is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro a. Ferraris

customer_reviews.title: Battery is poor and back cover broken after 3-4 times removal
customer_reviews.text: Everything is amazing except battery, battery is very very poor, for 30 mins I lost 6% without touching anything!!! Another problem I release when I removed the battery cover (or back cover case) 3-4 times it's not closing any more properly because the piece of small plastic holders are broken. So it's not the same fill like it was in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Mevlan

customer_reviews.title: I would look elsewhere for a smart phone.
customer_reviews.text: Beware! This phone is an import and sold without a warranty. The Motorola help desk informed me that mine was from the Cayman Islands. As such there is no USA support. Additionally, six weeks after purchase the SD card slot ceased to recognize any SD card. Motorola informs me that the phone is out of warranty (purchased 1/15/2015 and today is 2/23/2015). Interesting that the title page now explicitly states that it is sold without a warranty. Seriously, I do not recall seeing anything to that affect when I purchased the phone. Was it added later? Guess I found out too late. FYI - look elsewhere for a smart phone; otherwise, good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT update to Lollipop
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite phone even above other flagship phones I owned. This thing is built to last. I sometimes drop my phone in construction sites but this thing never showed its scars and kept chugging along. Until it updated to lollipop. Then it started to slow down and the battery life went from fantastic to frustrating. Would recommend it all day long but stay away from the upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good, basic phone
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Android device and so far so good. I have always used iPhones and like them for their quality, but I needed a dual sim card phone for traveling so an iPhone was out. The Moto G is solid, comfortable, basic and does everything a phone is supposed to do at a great price. The only issue I have had so far was, after putting on an anti-virus program, the battery drained quickly. Removing the program took care of that. As long as the reliability holds up, I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jjkjr

customer_reviews.title: Dual SIM worked great in China
customer_reviews.text: Dual SIM worked great in China, I got a prepaid data plan and ran it off the 3G networks and although it is not blazing speed it could get emails pushed and access maps and other apps without roaming charges. One minor issue for me, I use a credit card sleeve on my US phone and this back is rounded so sleeve doesn't sit flat, I have to carry a wallet in this case.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing phone for the price..I was blown away when I first got it and have compared it to many high-end phones on display at other stores....this phone works just as great and is just as responsive. Get yourself one...you wont regret it! Did I mention it takes fabulous pics??? Absolutely beautiful...rich, vibrant, bright... Now, at social gatherings, everyone's like..."Let's use Lisa's phone...it takes the best pics....."
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Used in Africa on 2 different networks and work like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these handsets and they are really robust and reliable. Used in Africa on 2 different networks and work like a charm. The build quality is solid and the phones feel great in your hand with a slight curve to them. Thoroughly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dermot Hegarty

customer_reviews.title: "G" For "Great"
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for its dual SIM card capabilities, like a similar but single SIM card Moto G phone that I had previously and liked. Both are great values and a pleasure to handle and use. Unfortunately, the third generation Moto G does not offer dual SIM capabilities or I would have got that.
customer_reviews.author: Philip H. Kozloff

customer_reviews.title: Pretty phone
customer_reviews.text: I like the aesthetic quality of the phone. I plan to use the phone in Africa. But going by the track record of Motorola, I have no doubt it's going to work.
customer_reviews.author: Theophilus Odeniyi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap mobile phone...picture quality is meh, but I needed the bare bones phone and got what I needed out of this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ed V.

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone, Great Price!!
customer_reviews.text: Why anyone would spend $400-$500 on a smartphone when you can this Moto G for $200 confuses me. This phone has exceeded all expectations. It works flawlessly, the screen is fantastic, the camera awesome - in a nutshell the Moto G is more than enough phone for 99% of people (IMHO). I have had various Android phones thus far and this is the best. No regrets!!
customer_reviews.author: 10K Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall this phone is good but only has 3G connection. I am very satisfied with Android lollipop. Still there is some lags on the speed. Nonetheless, love this phone. Happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Cirej

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It's a great inexpensive phone that does well its job. Great size. I love the dual sim feature. And 3G is plenty of speed for me
customer_reviews.author: Vortex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace one that got dropped. It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's not too much better than the 1st gen one
customer_reviews.text: It's not too much better than the 1st gen one. We bought 3 units and all of them had probles with the sd cards.
customer_reviews.author: mr

customer_reviews.title: Some things missing...
customer_reviews.text: The phone didn't came neither with the wall charger nor the earphones. Not very happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Matias Torrent

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good functionality but it came without a charger n earpiece ---- not good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Dee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels great and performs smooth. I used this for overseas and found it to be an excellent phone.
customer_reviews.author: Triple R

customer_reviews.title: Good phone. Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Good phone. Good camera. Slows down as you load up on the apps. Overall I'm satisfied enough that we have 4 of these in our family.
customer_reviews.author: Sohail Muzammil

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's my first android phone. I have to learn how use it. Actually I prefer my old BB
customer_reviews.author: J.A. Neher

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, great price, working perfectly so far. It's not the newest model, but is still of great worth. I've been using it for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amon Aidukaitis

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I buy to replace my moto g 1st gen. I like it very much. Until now my motog 2 have no issue.
customer_reviews.author: bs

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has software issues . it turns itself of when you try to unlock it
customer_reviews.author: Lester Barker

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for less than half price of the other phones in the same class
customer_reviews.author: bluesman

customer_reviews.title: I love the device
customer_reviews.text: They change the delivery date twice. I love the device, but the logistic was very unprofessional
customer_reviews.author: Dulce

product_meta.title: Motorola XT1068 Moto G (2ND GENERATION - 2014) DUAL SIM 8GB Factory Unlocked 3G Phone - Black (International Version - No Warranty)
product_meta.description: Choose a brilliant display, stereo sound, all-day battery, Dual-SIM support, and latest Android OS. Your choice: the MOTO G 2nd Generation.
feature_bullets: 5.0-inch IPS LCD capacitive Multi-Touchscreen w/ Protective Corning Gorilla Glass 3
Android v4.4.4 KitKat (upgradable), Quad-Core 1.2 GHz Cortex-A7 Processor, Chipset: Qualcomm MSM8226 Snapdragon 4, Adreno 305 Graphics
8 Megapixel Camera (3264 x 2448 pixels) w/ Autofocus & LED Flash + Front-Facing 2 Megapixel Camera
Internal Memory: 8GB, 1GB RAM + microSD Slot Expandable up to 32GB

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars494 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
